title: How to Make a Coffee and Egg White Exfoliating Facial

steps.title: Mix used coffee grounds and egg white together.
steps.content: Mix used coffee grounds and egg white together. Combine well.

steps.title: Massage the mixture gently onto your face, then allow it to dry.
steps.content: Massage the mixture gently onto your face, then allow it to dry.

steps.title: Rinse it off with cool water.
steps.content: Rinse it off with cool water. Gently dab your skin dry.
